tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  scientific_name VARCHAR(100),
  habitat VARCHAR(200),
  population_size INT,
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50),
  population_size INT
)

CREATE TABLE GeneticData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  dna_sequence TEXT,
  mutation_rate FLOAT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id)
)

CREATE TABLE ConservationActions (
  action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  action_description TEXT,
  action_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id)
)

CREATE TABLE genetic_data (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id UUID REFERENCES endangered_species(id),
  gene_name STRING,
  mutation_rate FLOAT,
  sequence TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE observations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id UUID REFERENCES endangered_species(id),
  researcher_id UUID REFERENCES researcher(id),
  observation_date DATE,
  location STRING
);

CREATE TABLE Observation (
  observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  data_id INT,
  researcher_id INT,
  observation_date DATE,
  location VARCHAR(100)
);
